## pluck() function

Transducer which looks up given `key` in each input and yields sequence of these values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function pluck<A, B>(key: PropertyKey): Transducer<A, B>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>PropertyKey</code> | property key |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<A, B>`

## Example


```ts
[...pluck("id", [{id: 1}, {id: 2}, {}])]
// [ 1, 2, undefined ]

```
